recipes.title: Hydrating Aloe Vera Mask
recipes.description: A soothing and hydrating mask that calms irritated skin and adds a natural glow.

recipes.title: Exfoliating Coffee Scrub
recipes.description: An invigorating scrub that exfoliates dead skin cells and improves circulation.

recipes.title: Brightening Turmeric Mask
recipes.description: A brightening mask that reduces inflammation and evens skin tone.

recipes.title: Soothing Oatmeal Mask
recipes.description: A calming mask that soothes irritated skin and provides gentle exfoliation.

recipes.title: Clarifying Green Tea Mask
recipes.description: A detoxifying mask that provides antioxidants and reduces redness.

recipes.title: Moisturizing Avocado Mask
recipes.description: A rich mask that deeply moisturizes and nourishes the skin.

recipes.title: Calming Cucumber Mask
recipes.description: A refreshing mask that soothes and cools the skin.

recipes.title: Revitalizing Papaya Mask
recipes.description: A rejuvenating mask that helps to revitalize dull skin.

recipes.title: Detoxifying Charcoal Mask
recipes.description: A purifying mask that helps to remove impurities and toxins.

recipes.title: Anti-Aging Honey Mask
recipes.description: A nourishing mask that helps to reduce the signs of aging.

recipes.title: Apple Mask
recipes.description: An apple mask is a revitalizing and nourishing treatment that hydrates the skin, reduces inflammation, and enhances your natural glow. Rich in vitamins and antioxidants, this mask gently exfoliates and rejuvenates, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and radiant.

recipes.title: Kiwi Mask
recipes.description: A kiwi mask is a refreshing and revitalizing treatment that nourishes, hydrates, and enhances your skin's natural glow.

recipes.title: Honey and Yogurt Mask
recipes.description: A honey and yogurt mask combines the antibacterial properties of honey with the moisturizing and soothing effects of yogurt to create a gentle yet effective treatment for acne-prone skin.

recipes.title: Egg Whites for Skin Care
recipes.description: It may seem a little strange to put an egg on your face, but maybe no stranger than avocado and chocolate. While egg yolks have lots of nourishing healthy fats, egg whites are mostly made of protein and water.
